welcome_subtitle: Easy-to-use tool for converting GTA V vehicle mods into FiveM-compatible assets!
select_mod_instruction: Drag a folder here or select one with extracted GTA mod files (.meta, .yft, .ytd, .rel, .awc)
meta_missing_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: vehicles.meta is missing or corrupt. Using fallback model name: convertedcar
mod_instructions:
1. Open the mod's `dlc.rpf` file with CodeWalker or OpenIV.
2. Extract all relevant files (e.g. `.meta`, `.ytd`, `.yft`, `.ydr`, `.rel`, `.awc`) into a new folder.
3. Place all extracted files into a single folder.
4. Drag that folder into the field below or use the Browse button.
5. Confirm to start the automatic conversion to FiveM format.
